entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
